name: DemonRhapsody惡魔狂想曲
description:
Many Demons live around the world. In the same world that human like us live. We are act a demon who was a human. Try to escape from demon tower and get the song of demon to limit their activities.

This is my second game made in my life. Also second godot game I made. It's broke and I am not going to update it in the future. I am kinda like this game style and game art. Various Demon and abilities. But it is hard for a newbie like me to make such feature in this game.

you can get my code on github : https://github.com/JingShing/DemonRhapsody
